transArray.content: Yes, the front desk was attentive and the room was clean. Manager Zhang was also very enthusiastic in helping me with my luggage and finding a hotel. High praise!

Hello dear guest! Thank you for your recognition of the service attitude of our friends at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. Your encouragement is very important. If life is a journey, we are willing to be your warmest stop. If meeting is a ballad, we are willing to be your wisp. Happy note, I want you to write your mood in notes. Friends, I look forward to meeting you next time at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. I wish you all the best! General Manager: Zhang Xiangyun
